comments.body:
in reality [token IDs are public](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/bootstrap-tokens/#bootstrap-token-secret-format), so i would consider this a bug in the tooling.
can it be fixed?

/hold

oh, never mind....we are removing the token tag from the ID.
that seems correct in that case.

/hold cancel

yeah, from the PR body:
> @SataQiu: in #102174 you added a datapolicy:"token" tag to the ID field of kubeadm's BootstrapTokenString. I would like to double check that this ID is indeed sensitive data that shouldn't be logged, because it is currently causing the analyzer to produce a finding.
